content: pdf digital download crochet pattern stay cozy and modern in our mens cabled pullover front and back post stitches are used to create a beautiful cable that looks knit sweater is worked from the bottom up in pieces and seamed together pattern comes in s to 5x pattern includes a video tutorial designed in sugar bush yarns shanty video link https //youtu be/taxabk_s8aq yarn requirements sugar bush shanty -75% superwash merino 25% linen 186yds/170m/3 5oz/100g shown in sea glass #1509 size chart s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x chest measurement inches 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 54-56 58-60 62-64 finished chest inches 40 44 49 53 57 5 62 66 70 yarn requirements hanks 10 11 12 13 14 15 16 17 yards 1780 1950 2180 2360 2560 2760 2930 3110 crochet hook requirements us g+/7 4 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge us h/8 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge additional supplies yarn needle removable stitch markers blocking mat and pins gauge 15 sts and 11 row equal to 4 in half_double_crochet 9 sts and 9 row equal to 2 in single_crochet blo you are welcome to sell finished product from this design please reference sentry box designs as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
